Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.FactoryMatch

Class BasicMatch

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.FactoryMatch.BasicMatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicMatchFourPlayers, BasicMatchThreePlayers, MatchDecorator
public class BasicMatch extends Observable implements Serializable
Class containing the base settings for a match

  • Method Details

    • setGame

      public void setGame(List<Player> players) throws ExceptionGame
      This method sets the Game for a two players' match
      Parameters:
      players - is the players of the match
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if this method is called during an execution of a match

    • getPlayerFromWizard

      public Player getPlayerFromWizard(Wizard wizard) throws ExceptionGame
      This method returns the player which is related to the wizard passed as a parameter the method throws an exception if there is no player matched with the wizard
      Parameters:
      wizard - is the wizard
      Returns:
      the player related to the wizard
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if there is no relation between the wizard passed and the players of the match

    • playAssistantsCard

      public void playAssistantsCard(Player player, AssistantsCards assistantsCard) throws ExceptionGame
      With this method the player can play his round's assistant's card, then the player is placed in the list of players of the action phase where his position on the list represents his order position in the action phase
      Parameters:
      player - is the current player
      assistantsCard - is the round's assistant's card of the player
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown whenever there is an issue with the assistant's card played or the current player

      public void lookUpProfessor(Color c)
      This method checks if the professor of the color passed need to be moved
      Parameters:
      c - is the color

    • moveStudentOnBoard

      public void moveStudentOnBoard(Player player, Student student) throws ExceptionGame
      This method moves the player's student passed as parameter to the board of the player's wizard
      Parameters:
      player - is the player which moves the student
      student - is the student
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if there is an illegal situation

    • moveStudentOnArchipelago

      public void moveStudentOnArchipelago(Player player, Student student, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame

      Parameters:
      player - is the player which moves the student
      student - is the student
      archipelago - is the archipelago
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if there is an illegal situation

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(Player player, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame
      This method places Mother Nature, if possible, in the archipelago passed as parameter, followed by the update of the state of the archipelagos of the Game. The method checks if there is a situation which indicate the end of the match
      Parameters:
      player - is the player that move Mother Nature
      archipelago - is the archipelago where the player wants to place Mother Nature
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if Mother Nature can't be placed in the archipelago passed

    • resetRound

      public void resetRound()
      This method resets the list of assistant's cards played in the round

    • buildTower

      public void buildTower(Player player, Archipelago archipelago) throws ExceptionGame
      This method builds the tower, if the condition permitted, of the player on the archipelago, both passed as parameter.
      Parameters:
      player - is the player
      archipelago - is the archipelago
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if the tower can't be built

    • lookUpArchipelago

      public void lookUpArchipelago(Archipelago archipelago)
      This method, following the placement of Mother Nature on the archipelago passed as parameter, updates the state of the archipelagos of the game
      Parameters:
      archipelago - is the archipelago where Mother Nature was placed

      player - is the player
      cloud - is the cloud
      Throws:
      ExceptionGame - is thrown if the move is not allowed
